description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow. The user gains complete control over snow and can use it for offense, defense, and environmental manipulation.

users.circumstances: Monet consumed the fruit at an unknown time before her debut

abilityReveals.description: Monet creates a snow rabbit construct that attacks opponents with incredible speed and force, utilizing the shape and momentum of the snow.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used against Zoro and Tashigi during their battle in the Biscuit Room.

abilityReveals.description: Monet creates an igloo-like structure of compressed snow that can trap and crush opponents.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrated as one of her offensive techniques during the Biscuit Room battle.

abilityReveals.description: As a Logia user, Monet can transform her body into snow, allowing attacks to pass through her harmlessly unless Haki is used.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrated when Zoro cuts her in half with Daishinkan but she survives due to Logia intangibility since Haki wasn't used.

weaknesses.weakness: Can be psychologically defeated even without physical damage
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Logia intangibility - attacks without Haki pass through harmlessly
strengths.description: Monet can reform after being cut in half when Haki is not used.
Can create powerful snow-based attacks like Yuki Rabi that deal significant damage.
Can manipulate the environment with snow and cold temperatures.
